entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a character who had a plan to get rid of other champions and leave Harry's way clear.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story, and Dumbledore is talking about him.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric Diggory is a champion who helped Harry with the second task.

relationships.description: Dumbledore manipulated Potter through Cedric to get what he wanted.
Dumbledore influenced Cedric to open the egg underwater and pass on the information to Potter.
Cedric helped Potter with the second task by passing on the information from Dumbledore.
